name: Corruption (itch) (Svenchu)
description:
Game Entry for Z-Jam 2021: https://itch.io/jam/z-jam-21

Team Tiniebla, Development, Programming and Level Design:

-Daniel Ramos (@Keytotruth)

-Sven Wallin (@Svenchu64)

Tools:

-3DS MAX 2020

-Photoshop CS6

-Sony Vegas Pro 13

-Unreal Engine 4.26

3rd Party Assets:

-HDRI from https://hdrihaven.com

-SFX from https://freesound.org

-Music from https://soundimage.org/

-Models/Textures from Unreal Store Free Assets:

-ANIMAL VARIETY PACK

-Bunker

-FX Variety Pack

-Modern City Environment

-Modular Building Set

-Modular House

-Smoke Builder

-Soul City

-Urban Material Pack
